name: Milky Way Coliseum
description:
A fast-paced top-down shooter game where you fight against hordes of enemies on the Milky Way Coliseum

  • Fast-pacing
  • Powerful Shots
  • Normal and Extreme Mode
  • Space Theme
  • Three OST
  • Colorful

The soundtrack for this game was composed by students from the music course at the Federal University of Paraná (UFPR). The development of the soundtrack was used as a partial requirement for approval in the discipline Laboratório de Criação Musical V (Musical Creation Laboratory V).

The activities were directed by the doctoral student Hugo Leonardo Martins Correa under the supervision of Dr. Roseane Yampolschi.

Download and extract the archive.
Run the Milky Way Coliseum.exe to play the game.
